key.name: should-cache-covers
key.summary: Whether song/album covers should be cached.

key.name: stay-in-background
key.summary: Whether the app should remain running in the background even when the window is closed.

key.name: use-api-key
key.summary: Should the client use API key authentication or username and password.

key.name: replay-gain-mode
key.summary: Replay gain mode to use. (0 - None, 1 - Track, 2 - Album)

key.name: username
key.summary: Username to use with authentication with the OpenSubsonic server

key.name: server-url
key.summary: Base URL of the OpenSubsonic server.

key.name: should-scrobble
key.summary: Should the client report the current playing song to the server.

key.name: random-songs-prefill
key.summary: The amount of random songs to add that is prefilled in the entry field in the random songs dialog.

key.name: continuous-play
key.summary: Automatically add similar songs when the end of the play queue is reached.
